headline.main: Otto Klemperer, Conductor, Dead at 88; Otto Klemperer, Conductor Noted for German Repertory, Dies at 88 Also a Composer Impressed Mahler Performed New Works Helped by Recordings

abstract: Conductor O Klemperer dies on July 8 in Zurich, Switzerland at age of 88; career revd; illus
snippet: Otto Klemperer, one of the century's great masters of the German musical repertory, died Friday at his home in Zurich, according to wire services. He was 88 years old.
